title: Assessment of rural livelihoods, health and wellbeing in Vhembe District Municipality, South Africa and Narok County, Kenya: A water-energy-food nexus perspective
content:
Publication date: September 2024

Source: Environmental Science & Policy, Volume 159

Author(s): Christina M. Botai, Joel O. Botai, Henerica Tazvinga, Miriam Murambadoro, Luxon Nhamo, Katlego P. Ncongwane, Michael G. Mengistu, Nosipho Zwane, Eric Wamiti, Silvester Mpandeli, Masinde Muthoni, Tafadzwanashe Mabhaudhi
